DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study investigate efficacy safety MK 0974 migraine headache identify appropriate dose range study .
DOC.brief_title: A Dose-Finding Study MK0974 Acute Migraine ( MK0974-004 )
DOC.criteria: Patient least 1 year history migraine ( without aura ) Females childbearing year must use acceptable contraception throughout trial Patient general good health base screen assessment Patient pregnant/breastfeeding ( female expect conceive study period ) Patient heart disease , uncontrolled hypertension ( high blood pressure ) , uncontrolled diabetes significant disease Patient major depression , pain syndrome might interfere study assessment , psychiatric condition , dementia , significant neurological disorder ( migraine ) Patient history gastric small intestinal surgery disease cause malabsorption Patient history cancer within last 5 year
